name: Alphabet Armageddon
description:
For whatever reason, there are tons of rocks falling from the sky, and it's your job to blow them up before they hit the ground. Hopefully you've had enough practice with online typing tests because Alphabet Armageddon will put your typing speed to its true test.

What is Alphabet Armageddon and what can I expect in it?

- A very fun way to test and improve your typing skills!

-  Several different game modes to choose from such as the 'casual' game mode where you get to modify the difficulty level to your liking and on the other side of the spectrum, word hell mode. Keep a calm head for that one.

- Compete against other players in our online leaderboards! (NOTE: Currently works only on the downloadable standalone client! Any submissions made on the WebGL version here will not be recorded!)

& much more.

NOTE: Some game functions work better on the downloadable standalone client - If you have a low end computer, I would especially suggest downloading the standalone client for better performance. You can download it through this link or the button below;

http://alphabet-armageddon.com/AlphabetArmageddon.zip
